name: Maco Germany GmbH
overview:
Maco Customs Service is an independent provider of customs services that wishes to offer companies the best customs solutions for specific logistic, administrative and fiscal challenges. Maco is the information broker between a company and customs. Maco not only makes all kinds of customs declarations but will also support your company with its innovative concepts, permits and advice.

With the motto â€˜Custom-made Customs’, Maco seeks solutions for the customs obligations of a company that connect to its logistic process, are reliable and flexible and by that involve the lowest costs. Maco distinguishes itself by applying simplifications and innovations. By using customs permits, certifications, automation solutions, creative fiscal approaches, large opening hours and having skilful employees and a strong financial foundation, a solution can be created for each customs challenge.

Maco offers all kind of services that are connected with customs, starting with all possible import and export declarations. Next to the declarations, Maco is specialist in the field of Fiscal representation. Fiscal Representation is important for companies that are not established in the Netherlands. With Fiscal Representation it is possible to import goods without paying import VAT. Fiscal Representation is interesting for entrepreneurs from other European member states and for entrepreneurs from the rest of the world who want to distribute goods through the Netherlands. Having been cleared in for example Rotterdam, the goods are free and without any further customs interference. Now the goods can be stored and transported quicker and freely.
